visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Data Trends'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include monthly data points with a name 'Monthly Data'. Custom colors should be used for the series, and additional configurations should include chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Data Trends'. The chart includes styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The x-axis categories represent the months of the year, and the y-axis is titled 'Percentage' with a soft maximum of 100. The data series is named 'Monthly Data' and includes monthly data points. Custom colors are applied to the series, and additional configurations include chart margins, background, and legend settings to enhance the visual appeal and readability of the chart.
